plot: A recently blinded boxer begins seeing horrible night terrors after his eye surgery. When he hears the description of a girl from his nightmare on the news, he must figure out a way to save her before she is never seen again.
title: Seeing Is Believing
plot_es: A recently blinded boxer begins seeing horrible night terrors after his eye surgery. When he hears the description of a girl from his nightmare on the news, he must figure out a way to save her before she is never seen again.
plot_en: A recently blinded boxer begins seeing horrible night terrors after his eye surgery. When he hears the description of a girl from his nightmare on the news, he must figure out a way to save her before she is never seen again.
